subdisciplines.name: Structural Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the structure and function of biomolecules, including proteins and nucleic acids, and their interactions with other molecules.

subdisciplines.name: Quantitative Biology
subdisciplines.description: The development and application of mathematical and computational methods to study biological systems at the molecular, cellular, and organismal levels.

subdisciplines.name: Molecular Biophysics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical and chemical properties of biomolecules and the mechanisms by which they function.
